page.title: 07BURTON AND BURTON FERRY 2
page.content: Burton Ferry has a public house called The Jolly Sailor which is built on the shore and is very popular. In the summer people can sit outside having a drink and enjoying the views. Next to the Jolly Sailor is Jenkins Boat Yard, which is a busy place since boating is very popular in the area. Burton Ferry has a combined shop and Post Office. The village of{Burton}also has a public house called The Stable Bar. It is situated about two hundred yards from the village church. This is a very attractive church about nine hundred years old and built on a small hill overlooking Church Lane and Church Farm. There are various clubs and sporting activities in the area which is a pleasant place to live as there are plenty of things for people to enjoy.
